attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I wanted to show my support for our racist president ❤️ but my entire screen froze the minute I opened the app! Then when I refreshed the app my phone started glitching! Absolutely horrible! This app completely ruined my phone. How terrible! The saddest part is, I’m not even surprised! Don’t waste your storage on this garbage app!

attributes.title: This app would NOT stop glitching!!😤😤😤
attributes.review: This is by far the worst app i’ve ever seen, it literally gave me a WHOLE STD. Not cool. Here I was minding my own business just seeing how cool our president is #annoyingorange2020🇺🇸🇺🇸 and this app had the AUDACITY to literally give me gonorrhea. TWICE. Disgusting. And I had thought the president had the best intentions for his people. Never downloading again.😡

attributes.title: Invaded my privacy
attributes.review: This app ruined my entire phone. I got it to see what was going on with the election and all of the sudden my entire time line on most social media’s was of Donald trumps media. Thai app is messing with my entire phone and It’s a complete invasion of privacy. If you don’t want your entire phone hacked, don’t get this app!

attributes.title: i✨am🧚🏽disgusted✨
attributes.review: i downloaded this app bc i wanted to see what our cheeto of a president was up too and ugh my phone immediately got hacked…i think the app changed all my contacts to donald trumps name and now i feel like someone is watching me. i fear that bc i got the app someone is stalking me!so for your own safety do not i repeat DO NOT get this app

donald trump is racist, a rapist, ignorant, and not very smart in general. republicans, or more specifically trump supporting republicans are puppets to trump if you think about it and they need help . and for you racists , how do you argue over black lives matter ? it’s not supremacy , we’re just asking for some respect and to not get killed for no reason . Also , #settleforbiden2020 !

attributes.title: if i could give 0 stars i would 😡
attributes.review:
worst app ever.. glitches every time i open it, it takes all your personal information please don’t download this app it’s so terrible.. i hate it
they named it trump 2020 for some reason i think they meant “MAKE OBAMA PRESIDENT FOR LIFE”
also if you voted for trump i have a therapy session available for you :) #youneedhelp

attributes.title: HORRIBLE app. I absolutely hated it.
attributes.review: for starters this app took AGES to download, literally like an hour and a half, which is completely unreasonable. second, it’s so hard to navigate, i couldn’t find ANYTHING that i was looking for. i had to exit to app because i got so frustrated. lastly, it gave me no reason to support this horrible man.

attributes.title: Why tho
attributes.review: No one is gonna vote for him anyway, so might as well take the app off the app store. There are many things wrong with this app such as lagging, ultimate confusion on where to go, and is violating America with Trumps ways. No one wants a racist president who possibly made an app to support him. Like anyone would do that. Thank you for your time.

attributes.title: Trump doesn’t care
attributes.review: Trump only cares about himself this app just tries to make us vote for him in the fair if he's not gonna do anything for us honestly he's not a great honestly he's not a great president and should not be elected for next year This apple is nothing but a waste of time this is one of the worst apps an app stores america is not great with Trump as president.

attributes.title: Unnecessary Request for Information
attributes.review: I am vigilant of my online privacy and what I let out onto the internet, but immediately, this app required me to enter my number. I did not oblige. I just wanted to learn more about my president, however, it feels as though this app is more of a scam than a learning tool. 1-star review.
